editorialSummary.text: Retail chain carrying gear, apparel & footwear for a wide range of outdoor & fitness activities.

originalText.text:
So this is my follow up review to a not so pleasant experience I had at the BROADWAY LAFAYETTE location about 7-8 months ago. Not going to get into exact details as it doesn‚Äôt deserve any publicity on this post but I was somewhat happy when EILEEN; the MANAGER ON DUTY (Cornell University GRADUATE as well I might addüòè) took matters into her own hands and issued me a $30 gift üéÅ card and a formal apology .
I accepted her formal apology as I felt it was genuine and she vowed to improve and be more transparent in the store pick-up/ return (credit refund)procedures when using the REI points /credits system online ‚Ä¶.hope you got all that üòè.
So in closing REI made me whole again by #1. Taking OWNERSHIP of the mistake in question.
#2. Issuing a formal apology.
#3. Issuing me a gift card for the major inconvenience.

Thanks EILEEN üòéand Thanks REI üôèüèæ

Healthy Regards,
Val C.

originalText.text: Terrible experience with this Brand. They do not offer simple and free returns, you can' exchange in an easy process. They are definitely not a customer service oriented brand and returning my goods that didn't fit (their Medium pants fit like a LARGE and their small in shirts fit like an extra small...Go figure. Even if their sizing is all over the place you will have to incur the cost of returning the goods plus you will have to go in person to a post office. Originally I wanted to exchange the sizes but when I see the complexity and cost of the whole thing I just gave up. Really not worth the outrageous prices!

originalText.text: REI is the Mecca for outdoors. I love just walking in the store, I feel like I am closer to upstate Ny or the woods. Get the membership, it‚Äôs a no brained and they always have the best prices. Sometimes their staff isn‚Äôt that knowledgeable however when you call their customer service they will get you an experienced rep to make sure you make the right purchase. They have camping equipment, biking equipment, all outdoor clothes accessories and so much more. This is a must see location

originalText.text: This has to be the worst store I‚Äôve ever been to! I went there to go shopping and while I was looking at stuff this employee made fun of my outfit! I was very hurt because I was wearing my favorite outfit I handmade myself. I asked for the manager and the manager was also making fun of my outfit. The costumer service at this is store is horrible! I recommend you don‚Äôt shop here. And did I mention I saw 2 roaches in there!? That was disgusting to see.

originalText.text: I had a great ski boot shopping experience with Dave! He was very kind, patient, and knowledgable about the different boot options. He even spent time after the store had closed to unscrew and re-screw different buckle positions to get the best fit. I've always had good customer service at this location but this particularly stood out.
